tuv.seg: Hepatitis C and the Health Amendment Act Card
Heipitíteas C agus an Cárta faoin Acht Sláinte (Leasú)

There are special arrangements within the health services for people who have contracted Hepatitis C directly or indirectly through the administration within the State of Human Immunoglobulin-Anti-D or another blood product or a blood transfusion

Tá socruithe speisialta ann laistigh de na seirbhísí sláinte do dhaoine a rinne Heipitíteas C a tholgadh go díreach nó go hindíreach trí Ghlóbailin Imdhíonachta Daonna-Frith-D nó trí tháirge fola eile nó fuilaistriúchán a riaradh laistigh den Stát
They are entitled to services such as GP, nursing and home help services as well as counselling services, regardless of their income
They are entitled to services such as GP, nursing and home help services as well as counselling services, regardless of their income
These services are covered by the Health Amendment Act Card (HAA Card)
Tá na seirbhísí seo cumhdaithe ag an gCárta faoin Acht Leasú Sláinte (Leasú) (Cárta ALS)
Hepatitis C Insurance Scheme
Scéim árachais Heipitíteas C

The Hepatitis C insurance scheme enables those infected with Hepatitis C and/or HIV, through the administration within the State of contaminated blood or blood products, to take out life assurance, mortgage protection and travel insurance

Cuireann an scéim árachais Heipitíteas C ar chumas iad siúd ar a bhfuil Heipitíteas C agus/nó VEID, trí fhuil nó táirgí fola éillithe a riaradh laistigh den Stát, chun árachas saoil, cosaint morgáiste agus árachas taistil a fháil
Under this scheme a person requiring insurance will pay the average basic premium which an uninfected person of the same age and gender would pay
Faoin scéim seo, íocfaidh duine óna dteastaíonn árachas an mheánphréimh bhunúsach a d’íocfadh duine den aois agus den inscne céanna nach bhfuil an galar orthu
The insurance scheme pays the additional premiums levied or covers the additional risks that would otherwise prevent a policy being taken out
Íocann an scéim árachais na préimheanna breise a ghearrtar nó cumhdaíonn sí na rioscaí breise a chuirfeadh cosc, murach sin, ar pholasaí a ghlacadh
The Hepatitis C Insurance Scheme is set up under the Hepatitis C Compensation Tribunal (Amendment) Act (No.22) of 2006 (pdf)
Déanann an tAcht um Binse Cúitimh i ndáil le Heipitíteas C (Leasú), (Uimh. 22 de 2006) (pdf) cur i bhfeidhm agus oibriú na Scéime Árachais Heipitíteas C a rialú

If you have contracted Hepatitis C directly or indirectly through the administration within the State of Human Immunoglobulin-Anti-D or another blood product or a blood transfusion, you can apply for a Health Amendment Act (HAA) Card

Má rinne tú Heipitíteas C a tholgadh go díreach nó go hindíreach trí Ghlóbailin Imdhíonachta Daonna-Frith-D nó trí tháirge fola eile nó fuilaistriúchán a riaradh laistigh den Stát, féadfaidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh ar Chárta faoin Acht Sláinte (Leasú) (ASL)
The HAA Card entitles you to the following services, free of charge
Tugann an Cárta ASL an teidlíocht duit na seirbhísí a leanas a fháil saor in aisce
• Prescribed drugs and medicines and medical and surgical aids and appliances
• Drugaí agus míochaine ar oideas agus trealamh cúnta agus fearas leighis agus máinliach
• Home nursing and home support services
• Altranas baile agus seirbhísí tacaíochta baile
• Dental, ophthalmic and aural services and appliances
• Fiaclóireacht, oftailmeach agus seirbhísí agus fearas cluasa
• Counselling services for both you and your family and
• Seirbhísí comhairle duit féin agus do do theaglach agus
• Such other services as may be prescribed by the Minister for Health
• Aon seirbhísí eile a thograíonn an tAire Sláinte a chur ar fáil
This is an individual entitlement for the person with Hepatitis C
Is é/í an duine a bhfuil Heipitíteas C air/uirthi atá i dteideal na seirbhísí seo
However, dependants are entitled to a free counselling in respect of Hepatitis C
Ach, tá seirbhísí comhairlithe ar fáil in aisce do chleithiúnaithe maidir le Heipitíteas C
These counselling services are provided by private practitioners, by arrangement between you and the Health Service Executive (HSE)
Cuireann cleachtóirí príobháideacha na seirbhísí comhairlithe ar fáil ach socrú a dhéanamh idir thú féin agus Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte
You are entitled to these services free of charge even if you require them for non-Hepatitis C-related illnesses
Tá tú i dteideal na seirbhísí seo saor in aisce fiú má theastaíonn siad uait do thinnis nach mbaineann le Heipitíteas C
All GPs are eligible to provide services. You do not have to choose a GP who is part of the Primary Care Re-imbursement Service
Is féidir le gach LG na seirbhísí seo a chur ar fáil, ní gá duit LG atá páirteach sa scéim Sheirbhísí Ginearálta Leighis a roghnú
Home support services can be provided by the home help service in the HSE
Féadfaidh an tseirbhís chúntóirí sa bhaile in FSS seirbhísí tacaíochta baile a sholáthar
If you are considered to be in need of home help services, the HSE Area may provide the service directly or you may make your own arrangements
Má cheaptar go bhfuil seirbhísí cúnaimh bhaile ag teastáil uait d'fhéadfadh sé go gcuirfeadh an Limistéar FSS an tseirbhís sin ar fáil go díreach nó d'fhéadfadh tú na socruithe a dhéanamh tú féin
If you make your own arrangements, you are the employer of the home help and you are responsible for your employee's PRSI and Tax
Má dhéanann tú na socruithe tú féin, is tusa fostóir an té atá i mbun an chúnaimh agus tá tú freagrach as ÁSPC an fhostaí, cáin & rl
The HSE pays a contribution to the costs involved
Íocann an FSS cuid den chostas atá i gceist
Dental, ophthalmic and aural services are provided on broadly the same basis for medical card holders
Cuirtear seirbhísí fiaclóireachta, oftailmeacha agus cluasa ar fáil ar an mbonn céanna mórán agus atá siad curtha ar fáil do shealbhóirí cártaí leighis
However, there are more favourable arrangements for HAA Card holders
Tá socruithe níos fabhraí ann do shealbhóirí an Chárta ASL, áfach
You can get hearing aids and aural services by arrangement with the HSE
Is féidir leat cluaisíní cúnta a fháil agus seirbhísí cluasa ach socrú a dhéanamh leis an FSS
The HSE arranges for the supply of medical and surgical appliances that are not available from a pharmacist
Déanann an FSS socrú go mbeadh fearas leighis agus máinliach nach féidir teacht air sa chógaslann curtha ar fáil
To apply for a HAA Card contact your Hepatitis C Liaison Officer in your Local Health Office or the National Hepatitis C Office
Chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar Chárta ASL, déan teagmháil le d’Oifigeach Idirchaidrimh Heipitíteas C nó leis an Oifig Náisiúnta Heipitíteas C – féach ‘Cá ndéanfaidh mé iarratas? ’ thíos
Your entitlement to these services lasts for life
Eisítear Cárta faoin Acht um Leasú Sláinte duit
Further details on entitlements and how to access them will be provided by the Hepatitis C Liaison Officer in your Local Health Office
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar theidlíochtaí agus cén chaoi le theacht orthu ar fáil ó Oifigeach Teagmhála Heipitíteas C ag an oifig sláinte áitiúil
Entitlements are also set out in the Information Guide to Primary Care and Hospital Services (pdf)
Tá teidlíochtaí leagtha síos sa Treoir Fhaisnéise maidir le Seirbhísí Cúraim Phríomhúil agus Ospidéil (pdf) freisin
Further details on entitlements and how to access them and a leaflet on living with Hepatitis C (pdf) can from be found on the website of the Consultative Council on Hepatitis C
Is féidir breis sonraí ar theidlíochtaí agus ar conas iad a rochtain agus bileog ar mhaireachtáil le Heipitíteas C (pdf) a fháil ar láithreán gréasáin na Comhairle Comhairlí ar Heipitíteas C
